hopobject.name: educationalBoosterPack
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_4) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/27.0.1453.116 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body:
Educational BoosterPack demo

  • BeagleBone LaunchPad Cape
  • Educational BoosterPack

Demo code 

var b=require('bonescript');
var LED_RED='P9_25';
var LED_GREEN='P9_27';
doRedLow();
function doRedLow() {
    console.log('Setting LED_RED low');
    b.pinMode(LED_RED, b.OUTPUT);
    b.digitalWrite(LED_RED, b.LOW, onRedLow);
}
function onRedLow(x) {
    console.log('Waiting 1 second');
    setTimeout(onRedTimeout, 1000);
}
function onRedTimeout() {
    console.log('Setting LED_RED high');
    b.digitalWrite(LED_RED, b.HIGH, onRedHigh);
}
function onRedHigh() {
    doGreenLow();
}
function doGreenLow() {
    console.log('Setting LED_GREEN low');
    b.pinMode(LED_GREEN, b.OUTPUT);
    b.digitalWrite(LED_GREEN, b.LOW, onGreenLow);
}
function onGreenLow() {
}
